titleInfo.title: Four iron horses in a row

mods.abstract: Four Iron Horses in a row- a sight that should warm the heart of any rail fan. This fleet of locomotives from Cora-Texas was purchased by E. Koche in 1949 and stored on "the hill" juts outside the town of Donaldsonville, Louisiana.

titleInfo.title: Louisiana Sea Grant Digital Images Collection

mods.accessCondition: Physical rights are retained by Donald W. Davis. Copyright is retained in accordance with U.S. copyright laws.
Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
mods.note: Butler, W.E. Down Among the Sugar Cane: The Story of Louisiana Sugar Plantations and Their Railroads. Baton Rouge, LA: Moran Publishing Corporation, 1980.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
